                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Up-and-coming sports reporter (Hartnett) rescues a homeless man ("Champ", 
Jackson) only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have 
passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ&#039;s story and escape 
the shadow of his father&#039;s success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious 
reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

Director: Rod Lurie

Writers : Michael Bortman
        : Allison Burnett

Cast    : Samuel L. Jackson
        : Josh Hartnett
        : Teri Hatcher
        : Peter Coyote
        : Dakota Goyo

Enjoy this movie.
